Jax.name: Jaxº
Jax.title: ºøGrandmaster at Armsøº
Jax.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIt is seldom the case where a champion is defined by his actions after joining the League of Legends rather than before. Such is the case with Jax, for whom the argument could be made that he is the most prolific tournament fighter currently at the Institute of War. Before joining the League, Jax was an unremarkable soldier-for-hire. For reasons known only to the former leader of the League, High Councilor Reginald Ashram, Jax was put on the top of the list of candidates to receive a League Judgment - the interview process that either accepts or rejects a prospective champion. His Judgment was the quickest in League history, where the Doors of Acceptance glowed and slowly swung open as soon as it began. Jax faced no recorded Observation or Reflection during his Judgment.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøJax proved himself to be an immediate terror in the Fields of Justice. The self-proclaimed ''Armsmaster of the League'' rattled off a streak of consecutive wins that to this day has not been matched. A number of summoners in the League grew concerned that the perceived objectivity of the League of Legends would be questioned by the presence of an unknown fighter who was unbeatable. For this reason, the new leader of the League (following Reginald Ashram's disappearance), High Councilor Heyward Relivash, created special restrictions for Jax to fight under. This was something the League had never done before, and something that has never been done since. The burly fighter responded by imposing his own special conditions; as a means of protest, he permitted himself to fight using only a brass lamppost. Neither the League's sanctions nor his own has affected his winning ways. The League has since rescinded its sanctions, but Jax has not; he fights and fights well with his trusty brass lamppost.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''Be advised - there has been an outbreak of lamppost-shaped bruises in the League of Legends.''ºøºøºøºøº
º-- Gragasº

allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøJax can Leap Strike to friendly units, including wards. You can use them to plan your escape.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºJax benefits greatly from items that have both Ability Power and Attack Damage such as Guinsoo's Rageblade and Hextech Gunblade.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTry to engage him in short bursts instead of going toe-to-toe with him. Preventing him from attacking consecutively drastically lowers his damage output.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøJax can dodge all incoming attacks for a very short amount of time and stuns enemies in melee range when it ends. Wait to strike him until after his dodge is finished.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºLeap Strikeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøJax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøJax leaps to a target unit, dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø physical damage if it is an enemy.ºøº

spells.name: Empowerº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºJax's charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøºøJax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) ºømagic damage.º

spells.name: ºøCounter Strikeº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøJax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack stunning all surrounding enemies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøJax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking ºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºø% less damage from area effect abilities.øºøº

ºøºøºøºøAfter 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for ºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºø second and deals øº{{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})ºø physical damage to them.ºøº

ºøCounter Strike deals øº{{ e5 }}ºøºø% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: ºøºøº{{ e4 }}ºø% increased damage).øº

spells.name: ºøGrandmaster's Mightøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºEvery third consecutive attack deals additional magic damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive:ººøºø Every third consecutive strike Jax deals øºøº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }}) ºøadditional magic damage.ºøº

Active:ººøºø Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him ºøºøº{{ f2 }}º Armor and º{{ f1 }}ºø Magic Resist for øº{{ e5 }}º seconds.º

ºøArmor bonus is equal to ºøº{{ e3 }}ºø + 30% bonus Attack Damage.ºøº
ºøºMagic Resist bonus is equal to ºøº{{ e3 }}ºø + 20% Ability Power.øº

passive.name: ºøRelentless Assaultøº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºJax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.ºøºøºøº
